overview:
## Return Value

A formatted string representing the list of objects in an array. Returns `nil` if the formatter can’t generate a description for all objects in the array, or if `obj` is `nil`.

## Discussion

The list formatter uses [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ListFormatter/itemFormatter] to format each item in the array. If [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ListFormatter/itemFormatter] doesn’t apply to a particular item, the list formatter falls back to the item’s [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSArray/description(withLocale:)] or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/localizedDescription] if implemented. If those methods aren’t implemented, the formatter uses [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObjectProtocol/description] instead.

# string(for:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a formatted string for an array of items.

## Declaration

```swift
func string(for obj: Any?) -> String?
```

## Parameters

- **obj**: An array of objects to format as a list.

## Return Value

A formatted string representing the list of objects in an array. Returns `nil` if the formatter can’t generate a description for all objects in the array, or if `obj` is `nil`.

## Discussion

The list formatter uses [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ListFormatter/itemFormatter] to format each item in the array. If [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ListFormatter/itemFormatter] doesn’t apply to a particular item, the list formatter falls back to the item’s [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSArray/description(withLocale:)] or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/localizedDescription] if implemented. If those methods aren’t implemented, the formatter uses [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObjectProtocol/description] instead.

## Converting Arrays to Formatted Lists

- **string(from:)**: Creates a formatted string for an array of items.
- **localizedString(byJoining:)**: Constructs a formatted string from an array of strings that uses the list format specific to the current locale.

items.description: Creates a formatted string for an array of items.
items.name: string(from:)

items.description: Constructs a formatted string from an array of strings that uses the list format specific to the current locale.
items.name: localizedString(byJoining:)
